flawed_nl_solution:
She needs to type an additional 1000 - 200 = <<1000-200=80>>80 words.
In one minute she can type 300 words / 30 = <<300/30=10>>10 words.
It will take her 80 / 10 = <<80/10=8>>8 more minutes to finish typing the report.
#### 8

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 800, not 80. It appears a zero was dropped from the number.
